description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. The curve gauge for this pool has been [killed](https://gov.curve.fi/t/the-curve-emergency-dao-has-killed-the-usdm-gauge/2307) by the Curve Emergeny DAO, thus this curve pool will not get any CRV rewards. This metapool contains 3Crv (DAI, USDC, and USDT) and USDM (USD Mochi).

en.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. The curve gauge for this pool has been [killed](https://gov.curve.fi/t/the-curve-emergency-dao-has-killed-the-usdm-gauge/2307) by the Curve Emergeny DAO, thus this curve pool will not get any CRV rewards. es.description: Este token representa un grupo de liquidez de Curve. El gauge de Curve para este grupo ha sido [eliminado] (https://gov.curve.fi/t/the-curve-emergency-dao-has-killed-the-usdm-gauge/2307) por Curve Emergency DAO, por lo tanto, este grupo de Curve no obtendrá ninguna recompensa CRV. Este metapool contiene 3Crv (DAI, USDC y USDT) y USDM (USD Mochi).

tr.description: Bu jeton, bir Curve likidite havuzunu temsil eder. Bu havuz için curve göstergesi Curve Emergeny DAO tarafından [durduruldu](https://gov.curve.fi/t/the-curve-emergency-dao-has-killed-the-usdm-gauge/2307), dolayısıyla bu curve havuzu herhangi bir CRV ödülü almayacak. Bu meta havuz, 3Crv (DAI, USDC ve USDT) ve USDM (USD Mochi) içerir.
